src_original: saptanetrau smṛtau bāhū prabāhū ṣoḍaśāṅgulau  trikalau vistṛtau bāhū prabāhū cāpi tatsamau /AP_44.027ab/
tgt_original: kaphoṇeradhastānmaṇibandhādūrddhvaṃ prabāhuḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulaḥ |  ekāṅgulo maṇibandhaḥ |  maṇibandhādadho madhyāṅgulyagraparyantaṃ dvādaśāṅgulo hastaḥ |

src_original: saptadaśāṅgulo madhye kūrpārordhe ca ṣoḍaśa /AP_44.028ab/  kūrpārasya bhavennāhaḥ triguṇaḥ kamalodbhava //AP_44.028cd/
vistareṇa karatalaṃ kīrtitaṃ tu ṣaḍaṅgulam /AP_44.030ab/  dairghyaṃ saptāṅgulaṃ kāryaṃ madhyā pajcāṅgulā matā
tgt_original: maṇibandhāt saptāṅgulaṃ karatalam |  madhyāṅgulī pañcamātrā |  tasyāḥ parvārddhonā pradeśinī |

src_original: kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhakau kāryau caturaṅgulasammitau  1 bhrūdairghyāccaturaṅgulā iti ṅa,  dviparvoṅguṣṭhakaḥ kāryaḥ śeṣāgulyastriparvikāḥ  sarvāsāṃ parvaṇordhena nakhamānaṃ vidhīyate //AP_44.032cd/
vakṣaso yat pramāṇantu jaṭharaṃ tatpramāṇataḥ  aṅgulaikaṃ bhavennābhī vedhena ca pramāṇataḥ //AP_44.033cd/

tato meḍhrāntaraṃ kāryaṃ tālamātraṃ pramāṇataḥ  nābhimadhye prīṇāho dvicatvāriṃśadaṅgulaiḥ //AP_44.034cd/  antaraṃ stanayoḥ kāryaṃ tālamātraṃ pramāṇataḥ  civukau(1) yavamānau tu maṇḍalaṃ dvipadaṃ bhavet //AP_44.035cd/

tgt_original: sa[ha]nābhiṃ yāvat ṣaṭcatvāriṃśadaṅgulaṃ nābhernimūtayo ekāṅgulaṃ pariṇāhaṃ ca |

src_original: caturmukhañca tadadhoveṣṭanaṃ parikīrtitam //AP_44.036cd/  pariṇāhas tathā kaṭyā catuḥpañcāśadaṅgulaiḥ
tgt_original: tathā vistareṇāṣṭādaśāṅgulā kaṭiḥ sphiccau caturaṅgulau vistārāyāmau |

src_original: tasmādabhyadhikaṃ madhye tato nimnataraṃ kramāt /AP_44.038ab/  vistṛtāṣṭāṅgulaṃ jānutriguṇā pariṇāhataḥ
tgt_original: veṣṭanena triguṇam |  tayormadhya āyāmena pañcāṅgulau vistāreṇa caturaṅgulau aṇḍakoṣau |

src_original: jaṅghāmadhye tu vistāraḥ saptāṅgula udāhṛtaḥ  triguṇā paridhiścāsya jaṅghāgraṃ pañcavistarāt //AP_44.039cd/  triguṇā paridhiścāsya pādau tālapramāṇakau /AP_44.040ab/
tgt_original: tadupari dvyaṅgulaṃ vistāreṇa guhyaṃ dairghyeṇa dviyavādhika - ṣaḍaṅgulam |  urumadhyaṃ veṣṭanena dvātriṃśadaṅgulam |  jānuveṣṭanamaṣṭāviṃśatyaṅgulam |  jaṃghādho veṣṭanamekaviṃśatyaṅgulam |

src_original: trikalaṃ vistṛtau pādau tryaṅgulo guhyakaḥ smṛtaḥ  pañcāṅgulastu nāhosya dīrghā tadvat pradeśinī /AP_44.042ab/
tgt_original: ṅguṣṭhanakhāgraṃ yā[va]t pādau dvādaśāṅgulau vistāreṇa ṣaḍaṅgulau |  adha ūrdhvena dvyaṅgulavistārau pādayoḥ pārṣṇī |  pādāṅgulyaḥ pañca dvidviparvā |

src_original: aṣṭamāṣṭāṃśatonyūnaḥ śeṣāṅgulyaḥ krameṇa tu  sapādāṅgulamutsedhamaṅguṣṭasya prakīrtitaṃ /AP_44.043ab/
tgt_original: tasyā apyaṣṭamabhāgonā kanīyasī |  aṅgulya ekāṅgulonnatāḥ |  aṅguṣṭhāgrau sārddhāṅgulonnatau |
